text: Ákos Kriza (10 February 1965 − 18 January 2021) was a Romanian-born Hungarian politician and health economist. Kriza was a member of the Fidesz Party. He was Mayor of Miskolc from October 3, 2010 to October 13, 2019. He was born in Oradea, Romania. Kriza died on 18 January 2021 in Miskolc at the age of 55.Meghalt Kriza Ákos ==References== Category:1965 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Hungarian mayors Category:Hungarian economists
title: Ákos Kriza
